title: What kpop group has the most toxic fanbase? - Quora

response.answer_text: Heres how and why these fandoms are so annoying and toxic. Every fandom has their toxic side but since I’m going to present what those toxic sides are, since I’m apart of them. I stan all of the groups below I’m just stating the toxic sides that I’ve seen in these fandoms. Armys=Obessive Annoying Misogyny competitiveness  The biggest problem with Army are the obsessive annoying and misogynistic fans. Constantly spamming non related posts about BTS and always trying to get them related into something. Don’t get me wrong “stream dynamite” but I’ve seen army’s spam on the wrong times, plus the whole entire “well maybe if you streamed(insert bts song) I’ve seen Army’s say that to people who have literally lost their family members. Overall it’s just annoying spamming BTS onto things that are just complexity unrelated to them. Don’t get me even started on the misogyny in this fandom, even though most of the fandom are women. They constantly body shame and tried to bash girl groups. Especially I.U, just because Jungkook said she was his type. Don’t get me even started with the blackpink-antis. I love the boys an want to support them as much as I can but that doesn’t need to be in a way of spamming or bringing down other groups for them. They always want BTS to be on “top” which I mean which fans don’t want their group and I don’t blame fellow army’s for wanting that but they don’t need to bring down other groups to do so. Blinks=Too many Akgaes/competitiveness towards BTS  i love blackpink, all of them, but there’s a reason why Jisoo has the reputation in the kpop community of being the “underrated member” literally jisoo gets more love and support from other fandoms then her actual fanbase. The fact that she’s the least followed member of blackpink, always gets the least lines, always has the most boring outfits, YG obvious picking favorites here to grab in the cash instead of treating all the members fairly. Oh god, don’t get me started on the Lisa akgaes. I love Lisa she’s talented and beautiful but her akgaes are absolutely horrible. They constantly bring down and hate on other members to uplift Lisa. The fact that there’s a 11-million gap between Lisa’s and Jisoo followers is insane. Of course there’s the members who are more popular then the others but I feel as if there’s more akgaes of blackpink then actual blinks. You can have your favorite/ there’s a reason why there’s such a thing called a “bias” but you have to remember to support the whole entire band! Blackpink already gets enough hate as it is yet the fandom decides to constantly bring down other members. This doesn’t just apply to Lisa akgaes but she had the most in my opinion amongst all the members. Another problem they have is their constant wanting to “top” BTS. They always try to compare them and try to bring them down not to say army hasn’t done the same but I feel as if there’s a difference between how both fandoms get into fandom wars. Blinks do it more as a competitiveness way while army does it as a defense of BTS. Blinks want BLACKPINK to “top” BTS whilst Army’s do it because they don’t want blackpink to “top” BTS. Onces-Misogyny towards other groups  again this fandom is mainly full of women yet they constantly bring down girl groups, especially blackpink. I feel that some of them are “salty” and “jealous” that the fact BLACKPINK is considerably more popular then twice now. Even though their not as popular BLACKPINK their still pretty popular. Overall once’s are pretty cool and chill, they don’t do the constant spamming and compare the members. EXOl-Competitiveness against BTS  same problem with TWICE expect with BTS. I remember they tried to join “forces” with blinks to bring down BTS for no reason. Spamming on their posts constantly. I remember that EXO was considerably the most popular boyband, but just because they no longer doesn’t make them less popular. i feel there’s also a bit of favoritism in their fandom as well. Not exactly akgaes but favoritism, Specifically chanyeol, Sehun,Baekhyun and Kai. Not exactly the same as Blinks but just more favoritism overall that’s okay. NCTizens -Competitiveness, and lack of care for other members  Okay I’ve already gotten into the competitiveness topic multiple times so I’m just going to skip to the lack of care for other members. So again not the same as blinks but it’s more of a they focus their light on other members/groups of NCT more then others. Not to say the bash other parts of NCT but more of focus their time on other groups/members more. So those members kind of.. drift into the background. I mean I don’t exactly blame them, I mean imagine stanning a group with 21(soon to be 23) members. Overall same problems as other groups with the competitiveness. Moomoos-Lack of accountability for Hwasa  In my opnion Moomoos don’t have the same competitiveness as other fandoms because of loving the way you look and creating your own beauty standard message that comes from Mamamoo. The biggest problem with moomoos is their lack of accountability for Hwasa. Pretty sure the you all are educated on her actions so I won’t get into it. People making excuses left and right and some moomoos even saying she’s part black? What? You can stan and love your favs but you have to hold them for accountability no matter how lovable they are. Put your morals before kpop! ReVeluv-Lack of accountably for Wendy/Competitiveness For what I’ve seen the competitiveness is healthy. They want red relvet to succeed but from at least from what I’ve seen they haven’t done any crazy shit to bring down other girl groups. Now for Wendy, pretty you all are educated about her actions so ya same thing what I said about Hwasa. I my opinion I don’t think Wendy is racist, or has any hate towards black people but I wished she would’ve taken back her disgusting stereotyping statements back and apologized. I think she’s ignorant but nor racist. Stray Kids-Has toxic fans but doesn’t have exactly a toxic side From what I’ve seen I feel like Stays are the least toxic out of most popular kpop fandoms. I feel like the reason why is because most of their fans are made up of of other fandoms. Exols,Nctizens,Army, etc. Why would Stays bash other bands their also apart off. Overall they can be toxic, example some stays trying to defend Woojin situation but overall I didn’t see that many. Most tried to exceed Woojin out of stray kids. Pretty chill fandom, from my perspective at least. If you’ve encountered toxic strays comment. overall these are all groups I stan. These are my opnions no hate towards any of the groups themselves. Every fandom has a toxic side no matyer how nice it can seem there will always be those fan. This is just a explanation on the toxic sides of each fandom I’ve been apart or at least from what I’ve seen. If you have any further commentary go ahead. Remember, groups who have more fans will also have more toxic fans. Overall good day, btw this post took me like a hour to write.

There are more than just one and ALL fandoms have toxic fans. Let me just list them, others can properly explain why they are so toxic. Now let me get something out of the way, I stan like 862974084 groups including the ones listed, i just believe a lost of the fandoms are toxic, except for those good positive supportive fans like me. and this isn't in any particular order -armies (BTS) -Blinks (blackpink) -Once (Twice) -Momoland (idk the fandom name) -Some (or a lot) of Loona stans. ——Now let me clarify this one because some might not see why. But i have met a bunch of loona stans online and in school, other places etc. And personally im very annoyed with them because they are always saying “STAN LOONA” i get that you want to support your faves and i appreciate that, but when you get mad because someone (like me) says “No thank you” its problematic. Let people try out groups at their own pace, girl i aint ready to stan another talented group.—— Back to our regular schedule* -Exo’ls (Exo fans) -Reveluvs (Red velvet) SOME ARE SO DAMN IGNORANT LIKE BITCH [POOR SEULGI AND IRENE MY GIRLS HAVE TO HAVE SUCH FANS] (Sorry) -Wannables Wanna One (Im crying inside, daEhwI) ^A lot of fans are annoying and childish and thats the tEa *MY TEACHER JUST SAID CLOSE YOUR LAPTOPS ILL BE BACK MY CHILDREN -Blackjacks (2NE1) ^I have seen an unholy amount of immature fans i swear just look it up or something —————————————————————————————————— THIS IS NOT RELEVANT TO THE POST BUT I JUST READ A COMMENT ABOUT MY BOYS NCT AND THE FAN SAID “I don't like their lightstick because it looks like a meat tenderizer.” I CANT BREATHE DLEWGDLWEU  CLC fans^ They always throw shit at (G)-Idle like calm down, both are talented as fuck, its not (G)-Idles fault that they debuted more recently when k-pop was more relevant worldwide while CLC debuted years back. (G)-Idle fans^throw shit back to clc as well And i think im done? you guys can comment more this is just from what i see. Have a nice day (:

True I was a huge part of the BTS fandom from 2015 to 2019 and stopped because I got tired of getting attacked by other army. If I posted a comment on any social media platform there would be some army that had negative things to say. Even on Weverse they don't support each other and encourage each other. A fan base that large should respect each other's opinions and not disagree so easily. In the end they should be a team working in favor of BTS and Not be cruel to someone for not having the same bias or because you are streaming another groups new song. (Showing love for a less successful group should be encouraged I think.) I still follow the guys as a group and I'm very happy for the success they've had in music but I don't consider myself an army because I had to many bad experiences in the fandom. I'm not the only person from my group of friends to leave the fandom from to much negativity “fellow fans” don't have any respect. I had followed the boys closely on social media and did everything I could to help them grow as a group.. I left from the cruelty of other Army that is what I respond every time I'm asked about being a army. There seems to be a lot of delusional fans in that group as well. I've seen a lot of threats of self harm and other terrible things over childish stuff. They are just mere men and not gods. Idol is the job they choose they all live by a contract and when said contract is over they don't have to keep a social media presence or keep the fan base around. So many fans would attack me when I refused to get dramatic over the fact the guys won't be bts forever. Just like all other famous singer songwriters in history they will grow up and move on from this. There's millions of fans in that group who think they will grow old watching new Bangtan bombs and the guys will be performing for decades. If you mention it they will really blow up on you.

Without a doubt I would say that BTS Army is the most toxic fanbase in K-pop. No this is not a biased answer because I used to be an Army myself. After a while of being an Army I started recognizing the weird toxic love hate, frienemy attitude that army has not only towards other groups/fanbasses but even to BTS . Army are always really protective and caring towards BTS but this includes making the slightest Interaction,comment and action to become a big deal and if you don't believe me when I say that Army isn't only toxic to other people but to BTS themselves I would be happy to talk about when Army dragged Jungkooks friend because of some silly pictures of them together what is he not allowed to have friends anymore?!? If that isn't enough remember when Jungkook revealed his Tattoo and instead of being supportive and nice the whole fandom started making up stories and theories about it ? Lets do better in 2020 ok?

The whole kpop fandom is just toxic I’m a kpop fan okay so don’t come after me K pop used to be so peaceful everybody making their music and fans enjoying it maybe like very little toxic people but seriously what has kpop turned into now! It just suddenly all turned into a competition. Firstly people bashing bts for having toxic fans but only say that because they have a larger fan base. Also there are bts fans that literally come at anybody who says something bad about bts. Blackpink fans just literally going on twitter and spamming hate comments on other groups. They also make fun of other kpop groups and if some other group wins they try to pick out anything that happened for example the scandel where they said nancy from momoland was glaring at bp that wasn’t necessary. Third onces just start hating on people that like bp for some reason. I know somebody that is once and all she does is curse at bp for surpassing twice and literally trying to pull them down. ExoL just start pulling people down that is above them and like trying to say that exo is the best boy group and how bts can never fill a stadium. Nctzens keep saying that the subunits aren’t part of nct and those solo stans and trying to kick taeyong out of the group like why? And basically if you stan a group someone says something bad about them people will come after you.

Blackpink some Blinks (especially twitter ones) constantly drag and degrade artists that surpassed/are surpassing blackpink, they plan mass dislikes on other kpop groups’ comebacks (like TWICE and BTS) one blink even tweeted: ‘people who were r*p*d shouldn’t be given sympathy ’ and hoped jin’s father r*p*d him as a child. They made fun of Taehyung for crying because his grandma died. they dragged MAMAMOO saying that blackpink should’ve won and that they flopped, they dragged and body-shamed CL because she was compared to Jennie, they also accused Hwasa for copying Jennie’s solo teaser and dragged her because she launched her instagram on Lisa’s birthday. they planned to spam BTS’ comeback with comments abt streaming, views, emojis etc. so that yt will freeze/delete some views, they even shade/throw other bp members under the bus for their faves blinks also accused g-idle for copying bp. bro they even exposed armys addresses like wtf. Like ik armys are toxic too but why would y’all expose stuff like that? srsly ion know what’s wrong with blinks but they need to chill tf outtt…

Definitely Blinks why? They even argue with their Fandom,like who does that?! They giving me death threats for a Stupid reason,Jusy because I am a multi stan.People might say ARMY is more toxic,we haven't even turned our Agust D side on and you're calling us Toxic if we argue with other fandoms we do it because BTS has gone through so much in their debut and trainees days.Oh let me not forget about this,Who was the fandom that made fun of Taehyung when he was crying,when his grandma died? 🕊R.I.P🕊Blinks where the once and if you say “Oh BuT tHeN aRmY gOt So ToXiC aFtEr” who wouldnt defend someone they loved because he was being fun of? Or what you wanted Army standing there while taehyung missed his granda (that took care of him for 15 YEARS) and was being made fun of?!You might think Armys are toxic but the list goes on,on how actually Blinks are the most toxic fandom.

All kpop groups have toxic fans . Some people say that bts got the most toxic fans ,just because they have a large fanbase . No, not all armies are toxic .And why do everyone think that bts has young armies , yes they have young armies ofcourse , but not all of them . There are people from 18 - 25 who Stan bts . And for the people who say that bts armies are from 13–16 , do you know everyone on earth without telling us ????. Like seriously do you know every army . Some kpop stans make fun of people for staning bts , they say that bts are boring , ( some kpop stans , not all of them ) who's being toxic now , armies ??? And another thing , don't give an excuse that you left staning the group only from the fandom , are you staning the fandom or the group . Did bts hurt you , I don't think so . I just hate when people say they hate bts just from the fandom , just ignore them .

without any doubt BTS has the most toxic fans. That’s happening mainly because most of the BTS fans are young teenagers between 13 and 16 years old. So they just get stuck with this boy group and they don't think clear about the existence of other groups too. Also many of them believe that BTS=KPOP that is completely wrong. But it’s ok. Its just like what happened with justin bieber. he had many fans (mainly young ones) and as time passed his fans got bored of him and searched for new ‘’idols’’. Of course you can find a few BTS fans who are fine and no-toxic. But sadly they are not many.

It depends… ARMY and EXO-Ls are literally making World War One-Internet Ver. because EXO-Ls think that BTS took all of EXO’s fame once they got into the picture and became more popular because of their songs (Written by the members of BTS themselves) Ironically, BTS and EXO members are actually pretty close with each other…so I don’t understand why we basically caused war with each other. ONCE and SONEs are at war because Girls Generation debuted WAAAAY before Twice and people say that Twice is basically copying Girls Generation But I’m not sure….Who knows? Everyone’s protective over their idols, but sometimes they just go too far, to the extremities. So much that it’s sickening.

BLACKPINK (BLINKS) I hate to say it but balckpink has too many toxic fans and they don't deserve it at all. There are more solo stans than blinks and hate on the members they don't stan. I am not a fan of k-pop at all but I must say stop calling Army's toxic cause they are really sweet and supportive towards one another. On the other hand some blinks create hate accounts for BTS to bring them down. I have seen so many hate accounts on instagram that only have posts that show hate towards BTS. Not comparing , just stating facts. Blackpink deserves better fans. All Army's aren't toxic so stop saying so cause tbh most of them are super nice

I don't think BTS armies have the most toxic fans. Sure they have a huge fanbase, but doesn't mean that the most toxic people are in this fanbase. I don't know why people are so sure that this base has the most toxic people. They are also fans of other kpop groups and artists. If you wanna prove that this group has the most toxic fans, you have to interview or experiment atleast a 90 million people individually, and these people are fans of only one group. Sure they may be toxic people in this base, but soon, they will open their eyes. I'm not only talking about armies, I'm talking about all those people in the world who are called toxic I suppose. Those eyes will be opened by that special someone, who is capable enough to do it.

Sorry but for nowadays, blinks are the most toxic fandom. They dragged other artists down even attack them, blaming army's if their faves didn't charted or win an award. Blinks are delusional and toxic, like this making a joke about a serious situation, like tf? Y'all are getting worst blinks since bp having a full album all of you starts to get loud. Y'all are getting obsessed on bts and army's. BP doesn't deserve a fandom like this, please just stop and just focus on your faves.

Orbits -Even though I stan LOONA so much, Orbits are super toxic (on twitter). Like the XXXTINTATION (sorry i probs spelled that wrong) jokes, and how they said stupid things like "iF x sTAnneD lOOnA, tHen hE wOUldnT hAVe dIEd". I feel like those are only stan twitter Orbits because Orbits on amino are wayyyyyyy better. ARMY -I mean we all know about them Buddys -I stan GFRIEND but like Buddys just can't take any criticizm DIA Fans Idk the fandom name but like i heard such bad things about them Blinks We all know about them

I don't think that you guys understand that most of the kpop fandom are toxic. Many have said that Army are the most toxic fandom, but also we are the one who did the most for the charity and the people. Can they just accept the fact that most of the kpop fandom are toxic not just army. How funny🤣 that you think you are not toxic. Accusing other fandom toxic that how you show your toxic right there. Please understand that every fandom had a good fan and a bad fan. Keep it in mind that if you respect their opinion they will respect yours too.

am sorry to say but armys ,just because some have a hard time accepting the fact that not all k-pop lovers adore BTS thus causing unnecessary problems with others because of that, wanting to prove that BTS are better than any other group. EXO-L are sometimes so dumb it hurts, they have a hard time ignoring the haters and just keep the beefs going ,like the time your wasting could be used to promote EXO and make them more proud of their fans
Blackpink has the most toxic fandom. definitely blinks. Especially twitter ones, they doxx, and deaththreat people anything remotely about their kpop girls. they put kpop over their morals lol.

Army, without a doubt. From armys talking shit and other armys apologizing for it, to some armys acting like victims because ‘not all armys are problematic’. It's a mess. Also being j-hope biased, it annoyed the hell out of me how some armys insulted his visuals. They always do the hyung line dirty in favor of vminkook, you can't deny that.

BTS Army's Toxicity is on another Level! Half of BTS fans are so Toxic. They always blame other Fandoms when BTS loses in an Award Show of YouTube views. They even said that YG paid youtube because Blackpink Broke their Most Viewed M/V in 24 hours. And they attacked Momo because of her Voice😡 and they Accused Chen of being RAPIST just because he has a Child🙄

bts (armys) is the most toxic fan bace every time other k-pop group have a comeback they spam on youtube so that there record will not break, this is the most unfair fandom, and they are the fandom that starts fanwars, they treat bts like godest, they belave that there fandom is the biggest fandom, smartest fandom… but the truth is… there fandom is the worst, dosnt mean that bts is famous they underestimate other k-pop groups or fandom.

i just released that y'all focusing too much for armys or we can say ( some of them ) y'all i saw so many toxic fandoms making fun of bts wishing them the death and making fun of their body shape ext, especially some blinks and some exo-ls we don't say all of them cause not every fandom is full with the toxicity so respect that and stop saying all the armys fix it with (some of them ) so i saw the hate that bts gets and the death wishing but sadly ur still saying and focusing on armys, that's really sad dude…

BLINKS AND EXOL They joined forces to defamed bts, Always making fake combo just to hate bts. Doxxed, sending death threats, and xenophobic. They are also a clout chasers, always mentioning bts so he/she'll has a lot of likes and comments. Disrespecting the religion, V's grandma which is dead and want V's to join. Wants jimin be dead. Calling their names. They really worst. They can't even donates.
blinks without question, they constantly drag other artists and keep degrading them. it is sad to see such an amazing girl group have such a horrible fandom, not all though only a few
ARMYs of course these mother duckers will attack no matter what for no reason just cause they dont like you

Tbh it’s gotta be blackpink fans. I mean a lot of people say that Bts has a huge fandom so of course there’s gonna be a lot of toxic or obsessive fans which makes sense but blackpink literally has a whole other fandom just for their toxic fans. I don’t know about you but that just proves that they have lots of them.

BTS without any doubt BTS has the most toxic fans. That happening mainly because most of the BTS fans are young teenagers between 13y and 16 years old. So they just stuck with this boy group and they don’t think clear about the existence of other group too.

Army They bully exolsHalf of the fandom are toxic as freak4-9 years old army attacks blinks,once,exolsThey are so competitive on everything, just because they have the most fandom in all kpop industries they always compete

Based on my own experience, BTS ,BLACKPINK ,MAMAMOO …others could have positive experiences with these fanbases & find them not toxic ,but this is how it went with me unfortunately, especially mamamoo’s fanbase!
BLINKS and ARMYS, I swear to god they are the most toxic! Like i can’t understand, just like if idols can get along so well why can’t we?
